title: Recruiting for tournament fun!! ADC - Mid  (Ongoing position) If your good enough. ;)
body:
_**Looking for a Mid Laner and Adc.**_

Currently have sup, top and jng, filled.
Need to be lads I don't want any pansies.
Make sure you have fun and are active... We want to play flex and tournaments often. If you don't fit the criteria above. Fuck off you bandits.

Send me a msg: _**Dirty Tip Rat **_

**"REMEMBER"** Dont be a pussy and not message me. We playing tonight at 6pm aest.

"Cant be a fuckwit that takes the game too seriously and you need to have substantial amount of social skills." (Use your mic you fuckers).

replies.body: Would you like to participate in another tournament, however it is taking place this coming weekend
